mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vote_list (id, title, content, media_id, vote_period, target_scope, attendance_type, anonymity_type, qr_token) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{mediaId}, #{votePeriod}, #{targetScope}, #{attendanceType}, #{anonymityType}, null)
INSERT INTO vote_history (vote_id, voter_id, voter_name, decision, vote_date) VALUES (#{voteId}, #{voterId}, #{voterName},#{decision}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vote_history WHERE voter_id = #{voterId} and vote_id = #{voteId}
